name: SPRYTE Communications
tagline: A New Energy in Healthcare Communications
description:
SPRYTE Communications specializes in healthcare and industries touched by healthcare. We are a seasoned team of pros with years of institutional and agency healthcare experience we leverage for our clients, advancing their business and organizational goals through results-driven strategies and tactical implementation.
SPRYTE Communications is a new force in healthcare communications. We are interested in long lasting partnerships and meeting business goals.

locations.address: The Bellevue 200 South Broad Street Suite 1160
